value.name: Richard Rodríguez is simplifying and thriving
value.description: Until Hayes returns, the brightest spot on the roster has arguably been Richard Rodríguez who suddenly performing like one of the best relievers in baseball. Rodríguez looked like a smart breakout pick after a stellar showing in the truncated 2020 season.

value.name: Josue Flores: Five years later and nobody has been tried for his murder
value.description: Today marks five years since he was murdered while walking home. His family shares how they're keeping his dreams to study medicine alive.

value.name: Who Should I Trade?
value.description: German Marquez (2-4) allowed four runs on eight hits and three walks while striking out eight over six innings to earn the win during Friday’s 9-6 win over the Reds. Sat, May 15th Richard Rodriguez (2-0) pitched a scoreless ninth inning Saturday against the Giants, striking out one and allowing one hit while picking up the win. Rockies starter German Marquez allowed two runs (one earned) on six hits and three walks over six innings of work. He also struck out three batters. Colorado lost to the Cardinals and Marquez fell to 1-4. Rockies starter German Marquez allowed eight runs on six hits and a pair of walks on Tuesday. He earned the loss as Colorado fell to the Giants. Marquez retired just two batters (including one via strikeout) before being pulled from the game. Wed, May 5th Richard Rodriguez allowed one hit and struck out one in a clean inning against the Reds on Tuesday. Mon, May 3rd Richard Rodriguez collected his sixth save Sunday against the Cubs, allowing one run on two hits in 0.2 innings. He struck out one. Rockies starter German Marquez allowed four runs on four hits over four innings in Wednesday's loss to the Giants. He also surrendered three walks and five strikeouts. Thu, Apr 29th Richard Rodriguez picked up his fifth save of the season Tuesday against the Padres, pitching a clean ninth inning with no strikeouts.
